page.title: 11Games in the Playground.
page.content: One of the best games that we play in the Playground is called "Had". In this game one person is chosen to be "It". This person has to run very fast and try to catch any of the other people who are playing the game. If the person who is "It" touches another person, then it is their turn to be "It" and they have to do the catching. The boys also play a lot of football and the girls like doing handstands.In the autumn we play "conkers". We collect the shiny brown fruits from the Horse Chestnut trees that grow in our woods. We bore a hole in the middle of the fruit, which we call a conker. Through this hole we thread a piece of string and tie a knot at one end. One person dangles a conker while another person, keeping their piece of string nice and tight tries to hit and smash the dangling conker. Great fun!
